                            <!-- 昵称区域 -->

                                    <!-- 用户昵称 -->

                    </div>

                    <div class="comment-main-list-item-content">
                        <!-- highlight -->
                        <div class="list-item-level1 ">
                            <!-- 昵称区域 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-header">
                                <div>
                                    <!-- 用户昵称 -->
                                    <h3>
                                        <a href="https://zhiyou.smzdm.com/member/5892474813/pinglun" target="_blank">清风流水520</a>
                                    </h3>
                                    <!-- 作者标识 -->
                                                                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-header-author">
                                            <span class="text-scale">作者</span>
                                        </div>
                                                                        <!-- 用户等级 -->
                                                                            <a href="https://zhiyou.smzdm.com/user/tequan/" target="_blank">
                                            <img class="comment-main-list-item-content-header-level" src="https://res.smzdm.com/h5/h5_user/dist/assets/level/8.png">
                                        </a>
                                                                                                                <!-- 勋章 -->
                                        <img class="comment-main-list-item-content-header-medal" src="https://eimg.smzdm.com/202501/13/6784925552cd23223.png" alt="">
                                                                    </div>
                                
                                <!-- 浮层 -->
                                <div id="actionBox" class="margin-right-15">
                                    <i class="J_more icon-more action-sheet-icon"></i>
                                    <div class="action-sheet">
                                        <a class="jubao" href="javascript:void(0);" id="report_279930583" style="display:inline-block">举报</a>
                                        <!-- 踩评论功能 -->
                                        <a class="caiNum" href="javascript:void(0);" id="cdc_oppose_279930583" data-item="3, 0, 279930583, 93656109, 279930583">踩评论<span>(0)</span></a>
                                        <!-- 删除 -->
                                                                            </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <!-- 评论内容 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-comment padding-right-10">
                                <!-- 置顶标签 -->
                                                                <span>页面中间“大额红包天天抽”可中银行卡满减红包（如500-20元）可还信用卡</span>
                                <!-- radio_3_4 宽高比例3:4 -->
                                <!-- data-radio值 0 4:3，  1 1:1，  2 3:4 -->
                                                                                                                            </div>
                            <!-- 用户信息 及点赞操作 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-info">
                                <div>
                                    <span>2023-10-24</span>
                                                                            <span>·</span>
                                        <span>江苏</span>
                                                                  
                                </div>
                                
                                <div>
                                
                                                                        <!-- 点赞 -->
                                    <!-- 点赞后嵌套 class red -->
                                    <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-info-zan" id="cdc_support_279930583" data-item="3, 1, 279930583, 93656109, 279930583">
                                        <span>1</span>
                                        <i class="icon-thumb-up-o-thin"></i>
                                        <!-- 已点赞 -->
                                        <!-- <i class="icon-thumb-up"></i> -->
                                    </div>
                                    <!-- 回复 -->
                                    <div class="J_replay comment-main-list-item-content-info-replay">回复</div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <!-- 展示出的回复框 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-textarea">
                                <!-- 回复表单 在隐藏域中填写参数 -->
                                <form class="comment-quick-form" onsubmit="return false;" method="post" action="">

                                    <input type="hidden" name="comment_type" value="">
                                    <input type="hidden" name="pid" value="93656109">
                                    <input type="hidden" name="parentid" value="279930583">
                                    <textarea name="content" placeholder="回复给清风流水520"></textarea>
                                </form>
                                <!-- 表情包及表单提交操作 -->
                                <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-textarea-opertion">
                                    <div class="comment_smileBox">

                                        <div class="smileLayerBg" id="smiley" style="display: none;"></div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div>
                                        <p>校验提示文案</p>
                                        <div class="J_submit">提交</div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                    <div class="comment-main-list-item-content">
                        <!-- highlight -->
                        <div class="list-item-level1 ">
                            <!-- 昵称区域 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-header">
                                <div>
                                    <!-- 用户昵称 -->
                                    <h3>
                                        <a href="https://zhiyou.smzdm.com/member/7409432219/pinglun" target="_blank">小up主</a>
                                    </h3>
                                    <!-- 作者标识 -->
                                                                        <!-- 用户等级 -->
                                                                            <a href="https://zhiyou.smzdm.com/user/tequan/" target="_blank">
                                            <img class="comment-main-list-item-content-header-level" src="https://res.smzdm.com/h5/h5_user/dist/assets/level/8.png">
                                        </a>
                                                                                                                <!-- 勋章 -->
                                        <img class="comment-main-list-item-content-header-medal" src="https://eimg.smzdm.com/202501/15/6787908aba3839194.png" alt="">
                                                                    </div>
                                
                                <!-- 浮层 -->
                                <div id="actionBox" class="margin-right-15">
                                    <i class="J_more icon-more action-sheet-icon"></i>
                                    <div class="action-sheet">
                                        <a class="jubao" href="javascript:void(0);" id="report_279949779" style="display:inline-block">举报</a>
                                        <!-- 踩评论功能 -->
                                        <a class="caiNum" href="javascript:void(0);" id="cdc_oppose_279949779" data-item="3, 0, 279949779, 93656109, 279949779">踩评论<span>(0)</span></a>
                                        <!-- 删除 -->
                                                                            </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <!-- 评论内容 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-comment padding-right-10">
                                <!-- 置顶标签 -->
                                                                <span>先报名了再说</span>
                                <!-- radio_3_4 宽高比例3:4 -->
                                <!-- data-radio值 0 4:3，  1 1:1，  2 3:4 -->
                                                                                                                            </div>
                            <!-- 用户信息 及点赞操作 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-info">
                                <div>
                                    <span>2023-10-24</span>
                                                                            <span>·</span>
                                        <span>江苏</span>

                                    <!-- 点赞后嵌套 class red -->

                                </div>

                                    <input type="hidden" name="type" value="3">
                                    <input type="hidden" name="comment_type" value="">
                                    <input type="hidden" name="pid" value="93656109">
                                    <input type="hidden" name="parentid" value="281016942">
                                    <textarea name="content" placeholder="回复给卢超宇"></textarea>
                                </form>

                                <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-textarea-opertion">

                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-header">

                                    <!-- 用户昵称 -->

<!-- 删除评论的二次确认弹窗 -->

    <div class="del-comment-confirm-mask"></div>
    <div class="del-comment-confirm">
        <div class="del-comment-confirm-title">提示信息</div>
        <p class="del-comment-confirm-content"></p>
        <div class="del-comment-confirm-group">
            <div class="del-comment-btn-cancel">取消</div>
            <div class="del-comment-btn-confirm">确认</div>
        </div>
        <div class="del-comment-confirm-close">
            <div class="del-comment-confirm-close-body icon-times-o"></div>
        </div>
    </div>

<div class="pop pop_main_box" id="pop-report" style="width: 480px;">
    <i id="popClose" class="pop-close icon-times-o-thin">
        <!--[if lt IE 8]>x<![endif]--></i>
    <div class="pop-title" id="popTitle">
        <div class="pop-name">评论举报</div>
    </div>
    <div class="pop-content">
        <div class="pop_width_400">
            <p class="pop_info">
                <span class="pop_jubao jubao-circle">
                    <input type="radio" class="normal" id="pop_report_1" name="report">
                    <label for="pop_report_1">垃圾广告！</label></span>
                <span class="pop_jubao jubao-circle">
                    <input type="radio" class="normal" id="pop_report_2" name="report">
                    <label for="pop_report_2">低俗色情！</label></span>
                <span class="pop_jubao jubao-circle">
                    <input type="radio" class="normal" id="pop_report_3" name="report">
                    <label for="pop_report_3">人身攻击！</label></span>
                <span class="pop_jubao jubao-circle">
                    <input type="radio" class="normal" id="pop_report_4" name="report">
                    <label for="pop_report_4">疑似水军评论！</label></span>
                <span class="pop_jubao_other jubao-circle">
                    <input type="radio" id="pop_report_9" name="report">
                    <label for="pop_report_9">其他有害！</label></span>
            </p>
            <div id="pop_report_opinion" style="display:none;">
                <textarea cols="6" rows="80" class="textarea" onfocus="document.getElementById('note').style.display='none'" onblur="if(value=='')document.getElementById('note').style.display='block'" style="width:378px;"></textarea>
                <div id="note" class="note">请输入举报内容，最少输入2个字</div>
                <p>
                </p>
            </div>
            <input type="submit" class="btn-cancel" value="取消">
            <input id="pop_report_submit" type="submit" class="btn_login btn_login1" value="确定">
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="pop pop_no_title" id="pop-status-success">
    <i id="popClose" class="pop-close icon-times-o-thin">
        <!--[if lt IE 8]>x<![endif]--></i>
    <div class="pop-content oneLine">
        <i class="icon-loginright">
            <!--[if lt IE 8]>√<![endif]--></i>
        <p class="pop_info"></p>
    </div>
</div>

<!-- 最新好价挂件 -->
<div class="side-jingxuan J_side_scroll_fixed">
        <!-- column流标题 -->
    <div class="z-side-head z-clearfix">
        <div class="z-side-title">
            <div class="side-head-tab J_side_tab">
                                <span class="active">最新好价</span>
                                                <span>热门好价</span>
                            </div>
        </div>
